snippet: British Prime Minister David Cameron and former leader Tony Blair have urged Sudan's government to lift the death sentence imposed on a Christian woman who refused to renounce her faith....

headline.print_headline: UK Leaders Condemn Sudanese Woman's Death Sentence
headline.main: UK Leaders Condemn Sudanese Woman's Death Sentence

lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister David Cameron and former leader Tony Blair have urged Sudan's government to lift the death sentence imposed on a Christian woman who refused to renounce her faith.
